snippet: The F.T.C. expressed hope that the winning proposals find their way to the marketplace soon to provide relief to millions of American consumers.
abstract: The F.T.C. expressed hope that the winning proposals find their way to the marketplace soon to provide relief to millions of American consumers.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission expressed hope that the winning proposals find their way to the marketplace soon to provide relief to millions of American consumers, Edward Wyatt writes in Wednesday’s New York Times. Read more. »

headline.main: 2 Deterrents to Robocalls Win F.T.C.’s Contest
